scripts.build:css:index: mkdirp www/css && lessc www/less/main.less | postcss -u autoprefixer -u pixrem -c postcss.json | cleancss > www/css/main.min.css
scripts.build:css:resume: mkdirp www/css && lessc www/less/resume.less | postcss -u autoprefixer -u pixrem -c postcss.json | cleancss > www/css/resume.min.css
scripts.build:svg: spritesh --input svg/index/ --output www/svg/ss--index-icons.svg --prefix icon- && spritesh --input svg/resume/ --output www/svg/ss--resume-icons.svg --prefix icon-
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:svg
scripts.clean: rimraf  www/svg/* www/*.html www/js/*.min.* www/css/** dist
scripts.postpackage: rimraf dist/less dist/svg/index dist/svg/resume dist/svg/stock dist/js/lib .DS_Store
scripts.safefreeze: rm -rf node_modules npm-shrinkwrap.json && npm install && npm prune && npm dedupe && npm run lint && npm shrinkwrap
